staff_coordinator: Dr. Meera Nair - HOD, AI & ML
rules: Each team can have up to 4 members.
Participants must bring their own laptops.
Late entries will not be entertained.
description: The AI & Machine Learning Summit features keynote speeches from industry leaders, panel discussions, and hands-on workshops.

rules: Presentations should be original.
Teams can have up to 3 members.
Speakers must submit topics in advance.
description: A premier event discussing blockchain innovations, featuring industry experts and hands-on workshops.
